title: Day 285 (Matthew 11) - Year 2

description:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Malachi 3:1

- Malachi 4:5

- Article: What is the Concept of "Already but Not Yet"?

- Matthew 23:4

- Jeremiah 27

- The Bible Recap - Episode 226

- Image: Yoke 

- The Bible Recap Book!
